author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

while looking for the proper modifier/era, in preparation for the 10.6 AOD reMINI-reNANO we stumbled upon many outdated process modifier and therefore cleaning them out

- run2_miniAOD_80XLegacy
- run2_miniAOD_94XFall17
- run2_miniAOD_devel
- run3_miniAOD_12X
- miniAOD_UL_preSummer20
title: Cleanup MINI/NANO modifiers
